== Installation ==

=== Ubuntu 7.10 (Gutsy Gibbon) ===

Go to System -> Administration -> Printing.
Then go to Edit -> New Printer.

Choose "Print into PDF file".

Leave the rest of the options as default and finish the wizard.

=== Ubuntu 8.10 (Ibex) ===

Run the following command:
<pre>
sudo apt-get install cups-pdf
</pre>

== Usage ==

PDFs will be saved in "~/PDF"
